# Web SDK Examples: Form Creator

> These are interactive Nutrient Playground examples. Click any link to try the code in your browser.
> 
> For local runnable examples, see [web/annotation/README.md](../web/annotation/README.md).

---

## Form Creator

- [Prevent creating widgets outside of page bounds](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?)

- [Visual alignment techniques for form elements](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D) 
    - In Form Creator mode, enable overlay grid lines to provide visual guidance for precise alignment of form elements.
		
- [Replace the default form creator menu with custom buttons](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D)
